title: borrow/donate textbooks?
content:
Fresher here, we got a really strict mech teacher who compulsarily wants us to carry textbook every class and he doesn't allow photocopy for some reason...

The textbook is Engineering mechanics statics (SI VERSION) by JL meriam, LG Kraige, J.N Bolton, Wiley India 8th edition..

Any seniors who are done using this book can you please give it? If not where can we buy such books for a cheap price?

comments.body: you can borrow from library. i don't recommend buying textbooks for your first year as they become useless pretty soon.
